title: Dynamic Queue Broken!?
body: I jumped in to ranked queue and during picks, and one of our guys couldn't pick. Instead of dodging it just kept everyone there in champ select till we closed our clients. We were still able to chat which was funny :P Now I can't even load in to dynamic queue at all.  Is anyone else having similar problems?

replies.body:
Yes I was experiencing similar problems and now I can't even start a game. I took a video here:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ckEzZrarF88&feature=youtu.be
Yeah I'm still waiting :/ I wish they at least acknowledged the problem. keep me updated.

>#UPDATE 6/10, 4:55PM PDT

>Really damn appreciate all the responses from everyone!  From this we were able to look a little bit deeper into this issue and believe we have a better understanding as to what is going on.  There is a bug with NA Dynamic Queue where certain players are getting "locked" into a state where they couldn't progress.  This occurred at the account level, so that account would essentially be permanently locked, but other accounts (like smurfs) would work fine.  

>We went ahead and restarted this section which should have released everyone from this kind of purgatory, but we can't deploy a full fix just yet.  We're hoping to get it finish in time for the next patch, but I'll update everyone with more details later.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

It appears that there was a brief issue about an hour or two ago where games weren't starting correctly.  It seems that the issue was resolved, but I wanted to double-check with everyone that the queue seems to be working fine.

Reply back and let me know!

Really damn appreciate all the responses from everyone!  From this we were able to look a little bit deeper into this issue and believe we have a better understanding as to what is going on.  There is a bug with NA Dynamic Queue where certain players are getting "locked" into a state where they couldn't progress.  This occurred at the account level, so that account would essentially be permanently locked, but other accounts (like smurfs) would work fine.  

We went ahead and restarted this section which should have released everyone from this kind of purgatory, but we can't deploy a full fix just yet.  We're hoping to get it finish in time for the next patch, but I'll update everyone with more details later.

Unfortanely still doesnt work. I just get a black loading screen that kicks me out after a minute of loading everytime I try to play ranked or draft.

not working on one account (silver 5) but works on the other (platnium 3). Its weird how its account specific

Hey guys, we just rebooted the service. This issue has NOT been fixed (we're going to try to get that fix in for next week), however you should all be un-stuck for now. There is a chance you get re-stuck. PLEASE POST IN DETAIL WHERE IN THE FLOW YOU WERE BEFORE, IF YOU GET STUCK AGAIN, THIS WILL HELP ME TREMENDOUSLY TO DEBUG THIS.

This is a really crappy bug and we're doing our best to hunt it down, sorry about this

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Chomey,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=EwnmvbkO,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2016-06-10T23:35:34.535+0000)

This happened to me a couple of times. When it happens, usually someone is on the final stages of their pick, and locks in at the very last second.
Yup same thing.  Wtf is happening
Still cannot use dynamic or ranked ques some of my friends can some of my friends can not even after the apparent fix
What does that have to do with dynamic queue?
can confirm that this is happening to me still
